name: Animals In Buildings
description:
In the post-post apocalypse, all that remains... are Animals and Buildings.

A little Action/Platformer that was made for the 2020 Haunted PS1 Summer Of Screams game jam. However, it is not scary.

How To Play

Plays best with an Xbox controller if you have one available!

Move- Left Analog Stick or WASD keys
Look- Right Analog Stick or Mouse (invert the axes in the Controls menu)
Jump and Double Jump- A Button or 'Space' Key
Attack- X Button or Left Click Mouse
Vertical Attack- Y Button or Right Click Mouse
Dash- B Button or 'E' Key
Pause Menu- Start Button or 'Esc' Key

Pick up pills to regain health and pick up energy to temporarily power up your weapon!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Mynkijames
